lawName: Construction allowed in high and very high fire hazard areas outside consolidated built-up areas
Minimum protection buffer zone distance from forest, bushes, or natural pastures
Minimum protection buffer zone distance from agricultural spaces with moderate fire hazard
Minimum protection buffer zone distance from agricultural spaces with low fire hazard
Minimum protection buffer zone distance from agricultural spaces with very low fire hazard
Measurement of the protection buffer zone starting from the exterior masonry of the building
Adoption of measures to contain possible sources of ignition in the building and access areas
Requirement of favorable opinion from the CMDF
Possibility to include primary or secondary network, road infrastructure, or water plans in the calculation of the protection buffer zone distance
